page.title: 02DWELLINGS
page.content: There are approximately 265dwellings. The majority are situated around the junction of the old Linton _ Haverhill road, and the West Wratting road. Here there is a small village green, where once stood the village windmill(peg and post). Here too is the Post office, which is still very much the heart of the village.The rest of the dwellings can be found in two other groups, Streetly End, and Cardinals Green.Other more remote dwellings were either farm houses, or what were labourer's cottages.South of theP.O. We examined 77dwellings:_ Detached 25,Semi 30,Terr 20,Flats 2. Materials:_All brick 45,Flint 7,Lathe& plaster 9,Timber 6,Mixed 10. Roofing:_Thatch 12, Slate 25, Tile 37,Mixed 3.There are 4 new brick and tile houses under construction.
